short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set of compact tools for developers which are used frequently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Current tools:
- UUID - generating of UUIDs of different versions
- Text Length - calculating text length with different options
- Encode & Decode - encoding intoCurrent tools:
- UUID - generating of UUIDs of different versions
- Text Length - calculating text length with different options
- Encode & Decode - encoding into Base64 from UTF-8, UTF-16, Latin and decoding back
- Password - generate quickly passwords of different coplexities
- Hash - hashing of any string (md5, sha1, sha256, sha224, sha512, sha384, sha3, ripemd160)
- Dummy texts - generating "Lorem Ipsum" text according to configs
- JSON - validation and formatting of JSON
- Numbers conversion - binary, decimal, octal, and hexadecimal convertation
- Pallete - select any color on the palette and get its RGB, HSV, and HEX values
- Emojis - categorized list of all emojis with search by names and descriptions
- HTML Special Char - categorized list of all special chars and their codes
- Encrypt / Decrypt - used algorithms: AES, DES, TripleDES, RC4, RC4 Drop, Rabbit, and Rabbit Legacy Base64 from UTF-8, UTF-16, Latin and decoding back
